metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18442 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Infinite Loop in zziplib v0.13.69 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service via the return value "zzip_file_read" in the function"unzzip_cat_file".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-18442` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1+esm1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zziplib package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3.1ubuntu0.18.04.1+esm1').
